# Death Candle (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Death Spells|death]], [[Evil Spells|evil]], [[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 1]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous/1 round per HD of subject; see text

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 131

This spell functions like *[[Death Knell (Spell)|death knell]]*, except instead of using the slain targetâ€™s life energy to enhance yourself, you use it to summon a [[Small Fire Elemental (Bestiary PF1)|Small fire elemental]] resembling a burning, howling version of the slain creature. The elemental acts immediately on your turn and otherwise behaves as if you had summoned it with *[[Summon Monster II (Spell)|summon monster II]]*. The elemental remains for a number of rounds equal to the Hit Dice of the slain creature.
